All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Animation
Animation class to handle the loading and displaying of animated sprites.
App
The main class responsible for running Pet Crossing: New Horizons.
Apple
This class represents an apple object in the game that falls from the top of the screen.
Button
Button class that extends JButton to create a custom button with a specific color and font.
CatchGamePanel
CatchGamePanel class implements a simple apple-catching minigame.
Controller
The abstract base class of controllers in our game.
EventDispatcher
EventDispatcher is responsible for managing the observers and notifying them of events.
GameController
GameController is responsible for managing the game state and represents one game instance.
GameplayPanel
GameplayPanel class that extends Panel to create a screen for the game

This panel creates a screen where the user can interact with their pet, feed it, play with it, etc.
Inventory
Inventory class that manages the items in the game.
LoadGamePanel
Extends panel to create a screen for loading the game.
MenuPanel
Extends panel to create a menu screen.
NewGamePanel
Extends panel to create a screen for starting a new game.
Observer
This abstract class represents an Observer in the Observer design pattern.
Panel
This abstract class represents a panel in the game.
ParentalController
ParentalController class for managing playtime restrictions and parental controls.
ParentalPanel
Extends panel to create a screen for parental controls.
Pet
The pet class represents a pet in the game.
PetCrossing
The entry point of Pet Crossing: New Horizons.
SaveManager
Handles saving and loading game data to and from JSON files.
Screen
Screen class that represents the main window of the application.
Sound
Sound class to handle audio playback in the game.
SoundController
SoundController class to manage sound effects in the game.
Tuple<X,Y>
Represents a pair of values of possibly different types.
TutorialPanel
Extends panel to create a screen for tutorials.
VetPanel
Extends panel to create a screen for the vet.
